verbs.description: [V: astros] bullpen implodes as red sox roll to game 3 rout entrusted with a tie game after five innings the astros bullpen blew up refurbished during the trade deadline and refreshed by monday off day two relievers yielded six runs gifting the red sox an 8 - 2 win and a 2 - 1 series lead houston dallas keuchel boston lsu jackie bradley jr jackie bradley nick saban brock holt houston astros major league baseball joe smith pitcher houston chronicle astros blue jay a j hinch roberto osuna red sox joe smith mitch moreland steve pearce steve pearce baseball american league alabama xander bogaerts yankees
